item.title: Experts say the divide between Minnesota and federal authorities is unprecedented
item.description: A new Minnesota website lays out evidence to counter what state officials have called federal misinformation after immigration officials fatally shot ...

item.title: Trump's about-face in Minnesota after Pretti's death is latest in pattern of sudden shifts
item.description: President Donald Trump is taking a more conciliatory approach with Democratic leaders in Minnesota

item.title: Storm leaves thousands in the South facing freezing temperatures without power. Here are the numbers
item.description: A severe storm has left thousands without power across the South and Northeast

item.title: More arctic air expected in parts of the South still covered in ice and riddled with power outages
item.description: A new influx of arctic air is expected to spur freezing temperatures in parts of the South already covered in snow and ice

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Monday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Monday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 21-31-51-60-63, Powerball: 18
